text: O. Chandrasekhar Menon (10 July 1936 - 24 August 2021) was an Indian professional footballer. He played as a defender. He represented India at the 1960 Summer Olympics (Rome), the 1962 Asian Games (Gold medal),1964 AFC Asian Cup (Silver medal), Merdeka Tournament (Silver Medal - 1959 & 1964) and 1964 Summer Olympics (Tokyo Qualifiers). He was born in Irinjalakuda, British Raj. Chandrashekar died on 24 August 2021 in Kolkata, India at the age of 85.ഒളിംപ്യന്‍ ഒ.ചന്ദ്രശേഖരന്‍ അന്തരിച്ചു ==References== Category:1936 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Indian footballers Category:Olympians for India
title: O. Chandrashekar
